sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Natural Gas Odor Injection Act.

sections.heading: No person, firm or corporation shall furnish or supply any natural
sections.text:
gas to any school or public building unless an odor producing liquid is
injected into the gas mains before the gas enters the premises of such
school or public building, so that a strong odor will be noticeable
whenever a leakage of such natural gas exists.

sections.heading: Any person, firm or corporation which violates the provisions of
sections.text:
this Act shall be guilty of a petty offense and each day that such
violation occurs shall constitute a separate offense.
